page.title: 02RENISHAW
page.content: Renishaw is a village in{North East {Derbyshire}situated on the A616. It consists of a large housing estate, which replaced the old terraced houses whose occupents worked at the old pits and the local canal dock which has now been filled in. Most of the people who live in these houses work in the local pits and on the local industrial estate. Renishaw is surrounded by rough grazing land and arable fields.The shops in the village are two newsagents,a co-op,a fish and chip shop,a post office an offlicence,a grocers,a pet shop and a hairdressers. There is a miners welfare a church hall and a community centre.There are two pubs.
